div.p: It was often a bit harder than it might be to configure an ActiveMQ broker inside a Spring XML configuration file. We've just added a simple Spring FactoryBean to make this process much simpler...

structured-macro.plain-text-body: <!-- lets deploy an embedded broker in this spring.xml --> <bean id="broker" class="org.activemq.spring.BrokerFactoryBean"> <property name="config" value="classpath:foo/bar/broker.xml"/> </bean>
